thread.title: BRIEF-Dong Yi Ri Sheng Home Decoration Group unit to sell stake in financial information service firm for 17 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dong Yi Ri Sheng Home Decoration Group unit to sell stake in financial information service firm for 17 mln yuan

organizations.name: dong yi ri sheng home decoration group co ltd
brief-dong yi ri sheng home decoration group

text:
March 9(Reuters) - Dong Yi Ri Sheng Home Decoration Group Co Ltd
* Says its wholly owned investment unit plans to sell entire 0.2 percent stake in a Hangzhou-based financial information service firm for 17 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/EWFiKD
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
